articles.title: Asia Cup 2023, IND vs PAK Highlights: Kuldeep, Bumrah dominate as India hand 228-run defeat to Pakistan - India Today
articles.description: Asia Cup 2023, India vs Pakistan Highlights: Pakistan crashed down hard in their Super 4 game against India on Monday, 11 September. Chasing a record 357-run target, Pakistan failed to tackle the Indian bowlers, especially Kuldeep Yadav and Jasprit Bumrah. Pa…
articles.content: Hello and welcome to the live coverage of India vs Pakistan in the Asia Cup 2023 on Monday, September 10 from Colombo.
